componentDescription: A customizable text input field with optional helpers, labels, and icons.

id.description: Optional unique identifier for the TextField.

error.description: Optional property for error handling within the TextField.

helperText.description: Optional helper text that appears below the TextField.

name.description: Optional name attribute for the TextField, useful for form submission.

label.description: Optional label text for the TextField to indicate the field's purpose.

colorScheme.description: Optional property to specify the color scheme of the TextField.

leftChild.description: Optional React node to be rendered on the left side of the TextField.

rightChild.description: Optional React node to be rendered on the right side of the TextField.

placeholder.description: Optional placeholder text shown inside the TextField when empty.

isReadOnly.description: Optional flag to set the TextField as read-only.

isDisabled.description: Optional flag to indicate whether the TextField is disabled.

isClearable.description: Optional flag that when true allows the TextField to be cleared.

isAutoFocus.description: Optional flag to autofocus the TextField when it mounts.

onChange.description: Optional callback function that is called when the TextField value changes.

onChangeText.description: Optional callback function that is called when the text in the TextField changes.

onBlur.description: Optional callback function that is called when the TextField loses focus.

onClick.description: Optional callback function that is called when the TextField is clicked.

onFocus.description: Optional callback function that is called when the TextField gains focus.

size.description: Optional Size enum to specify the size of the TextField.

shadow.description: Optional shadow property that could be of type Shadow, Elevation, or CSSProperties to give depth effect.

shape.description: Optional Shape enum to specify the shape of the TextField's corners.

styles.description: Optional custom styles to apply to the TextField component.

value.description: Optional controlled value of the TextField, driving its current state.

variant.description: Optional Variant enum to specify the variant of the TextField component.

hint.description: Optional property to give hints to the user about how to fill in the TextField.

setHint.description: Optional function that allows changing the hint text.

isFocused.description: Optional property indicating whether the TextField is currently focused.

setIsFocused.description: Optional function to update the focused state of the TextField.

isHovered.description: Optional property indicating whether the TextField is currently hovered by the mouse cursor.

setIsHovered.description: Optional function to update the hovered state of the TextField.

setValue.description: Optional function to programmatically set the value of the TextField.
